divs: Sighting DetailsWas arriving home at 9.55pm when took a brief look at the fairly clear sky when I noticed tiny lights flying in the opposite direction of the scattered cloud wind. They were like small distant stars but were moving in one direction. I noticed one then another then 2 or 3 together, they kept coming for at least an hour. Interested to hear if anyone has spotted this activity. Its as if they were imitating stars but moving in a certain direction. The brightness was like a dim star.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Dubai
There were no other sightings in Dubai on or around January 14th 2012
Summary: Large formation spotted in Dubai UAE
